Docs.summary: Represents a statement that throws an exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement> can represent a statement that throws an exception. The expression should be, or evaluate to, a reference to an instance of a type that derives from the <xref:System.Exception> class.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement.ToThrow%2A> property specifies the exception to throw.
## Examples This example demonstrates using a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement> to throw a new `System.Exception`.
